title: The Day the Earth Stood Still OST (1951) Bernard Herrmann
description:
The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951) Robert Wise

Music composed by Bernard Herrmann

01 - Twentieth Century Fox Fanfare
02 - Prelude - Outer Space - Radar
03 - Danger 
04 - Klaatu
05 - Gort - The Visor - The Telescope
06 - Escape
07 - Solar Diamonds
08 - Arlington
09 - Lincoln Memorial
10 - Nocturne - The Flashlight - The Robot - Space Control
11 - The Elevator - Magnetic Pull - The Study - The Conference - The Jewelry Store
12 - Panic
13 - The Glowing - Alone - Gort&#039;s Rage - Nikto - The Captive - Terror
14 - The Prison
15 - Rebirth
16 - Departure
17 - Farewell
18 - Finale

CD rip, MP3 Audio: 256 Kbps, 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.

Album cover: 

earth_front_cover.jpg
earth_back_cover.jpg

Of course nearly all of Herrmann&#039;s scores for Hitchcock
are classics, but this one stands alone. A great film too!
